entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thundershower late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of a thundershower early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Friday 12 May 2023
